    • Company

      public Company(StockMarket c)
      Creates a company which shares will be trading on a specified stock market.
      Parameters:
      c - The stock market assigned to a company.

  • Method Details

    • updateOpeningPrice

      private void updateOpeningPrice()
      Updates the opening price of a company at regular time intervals.

    • run

      public void run()
      Runs a company's thread: repeatedly updates its capital, generates revenue and profit and increases the amount of shares with some probability.
      Specified by:
      run in interface Runnable

    • updateCompany

      public void updateCompany(float amount)
      Updates the values of trading volume, total sales and shares available after each transaction.
      Parameters:
      amount - The value representing the amount of shares sold or bought (if negative).
